lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil and Wing Design

lessons.name: Lift and Drag Forces
lessons.description: Analyzing lift and drag forces in aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Dynamics
lessons.description: Principles of subsonic fluid flow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Understanding shock waves and supersonic flow behavior.

lessons.name: Mach Number Effects
lessons.description: Impact of Mach number on aerodynamic performance.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Basics of heating due to aerodynamic forces.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of thermal shielding techniques.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms

lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft structural requirements.

lessons.name: Materials in Spacecraft Design
lessons.description: Selection of materials for spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Load Analysis

name: Orbital Mechanics

lessons.name: Basics of Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Introduction to orbital mechanics principles.

lessons.name: Types of Orbits
lessons.description: Exploring geostationary, polar, and elliptical orbits.

lessons.name: Mission Planning and Trajectory Design

description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Subsystems
lessons.description: Understanding spacecraft subsystems like power, propulsion, and communication.

lessons.name: Thermal Control in Spacecraft
lessons.description: Exploring thermal management techniques in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Payload Integration
lessons.description: Understanding payload integration into spacecraft systems.

name: Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry

lessons.name: Structure and Bonding

lessons.name: Alkanes and Cycloalkanes
lessons.description: Nomenclature, properties, and reactions of alkanes and cycloalkanes.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry

name: Reactions and Mechanisms
description: Understanding organic reactions and their mechanisms.

lessons.name: Haloalkanes

lessons.name: Alkenes and Alkynes
lessons.description: Structure, properties, and reactions of alkenes and alkynes.

lessons.name: Alcohols and Ethers
lessons.description: Properties and reactions of alcohols and ethers.

name: Spectroscopy and Analysis
description: Using spectroscopic methods to analyze organic compounds.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Principles and applications of mass spectrometry.

lessons.name: IR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Infrared spectroscopy and its applications.

name: Atomic Structure and Bonding
description: Fundamental concepts of atomic structure and chemical bonding.

lessons.name: Atomic Theory
lessons.description: History and postulates of atomic theory.

lessons.name: Periodic Table
lessons.description: Organization and trends in the periodic table.

lessons.name: Chemical Bonding
lessons.description: Ionic, covalent, and metallic bonding.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Structure, bonding, and properties of coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Ligands and Complex Ions
lessons.description: Introduction to ligands and complex ions.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Understanding crystal field theory and its applications.

lessons.name: Isomerism
lessons.description: Different types of isomerism in coordination compounds.

name: Solid State Chemistry
description: Structure and properties of solids.

lessons.name: Crystal Structures
lessons.description: Types of crystal lattices and structures.

lessons.name: Band Theory
lessons.description: Electronic band theory of solids.

lessons.name: Imperfections in Solids
lessons.description: Point defects and other imperfections in crystal lattices.

name: Thermodynamics

lessons.name: Zeroth and First Law
lessons.description: The zeroth and first laws of thermodynamics.

lessons.name: Second Law
lessons.description: The second law of thermodynamics and entropy.

lessons.name: Third Law
lessons.description: The third law of thermodynamics.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Rates and mechanisms of chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Reaction Rates
lessons.description: Measuring and expressing reaction rates.

lessons.name: Rate Laws
lessons.description: Determining rate laws experimentally.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding reaction mechanisms.

name: Quantum Mechanics
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics and its applications in chemistry.

lessons.name: Wave-Particle Duality
lessons.description: The wave-particle duality of matter.

lessons.name: Schrödinger Equation
lessons.description: Solving the Schrödinger equation.

lessons.name: Quantum Chemistry
lessons.description: Applications of quantum mechanics in chemical systems.

name: Ancient Languages and Scripts of Middle-earth
description: This course offers an exploration of the ancient languages and scripts found throughout Middle-earth, including Elvish (Sindarin and Quenya), Dwarvish (Khuzdul), and the Black Speech of Mordor. Students will learn the historical and cultural contexts of these languages, their linguistic structures, and their usage in various inscriptions and texts. Emphasis is on understanding the philological aspects and the role of language in shaping Middle-earth's history and lore.

lessons.name: Elvish Languages: Sindarin and Quenya
lessons.description: Introduction to the Elvish languages of Sindarin and Quenya, their grammatical structures, and vocabulary.

lessons.name: Dwarvish and Khuzdul
lessons.description: Study of the Dwarvish language, focusing on Khuzdul's unique characteristics and usage.

lessons.name: The Black Speech of Mordor
lessons.description: Exploration of the Black Speech, its role in the history of Middle-earth, and its influence on various races.

name: Wizards, Elves, and Men: Inter-species Diplomacy in Middle-earth
description: This course explores the complex relationships and diplomatic interactions among the different races of Middle-earth: Elves, Men, Dwarves, and Wizards. Topics include the study of historical alliances, conflicts, and the role of leadership and wisdom in maintaining peace. Students will engage in discussions and case studies on key events in Middle-earth's history, such as the Council of Elrond and the War of the Ring, to understand the principles of diplomacy and conflict resolution in a multi-species context.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond: Diplomacy and Strategy
lessons.description: Analysis of the Council of Elrond as a diplomatic event and its impact on the War of the Ring.

lessons.name: Wizards and Their Role in Middle-earth Diplomacy
lessons.description: Exploring the diplomatic influence of the Wizards, their interactions with different races, and their involvement in major events.

lessons.name: Inter-species Alliances and Conflicts
lessons.description: Study of the alliances and conflicts between the Elves, Men, Dwarves, and other races of Middle-earth.

name: Ancient Languages and Scripts of Middle-earth - Continued
description: In-depth study of additional languages of Middle-earth, including the language of the Rohirrim, the Black Speech, and the Elvish dialects. Students will enhance their understanding of script and language evolution.

lessons.name: The Rohirric Tongue
lessons.description: Study of the language of the Rohirrim, its connection to the Anglo-Saxon language, and its use in literature.

lessons.name: Elvish Dialects in Middle-earth
lessons.description: Exploration of the various dialects of Elvish spoken by different Elven groups, including differences in phonetics and script.

lessons.name: The Decline of Ancient Scripts
lessons.description: Examination of the decline of written languages in Middle-earth and the loss of cultural knowledge through the ages.

name: Ancient Languages and Scripts of Middle-earth - Advanced
description: Advanced linguistic analysis of the ancient languages of Middle-earth, with a focus on translation techniques and the preservation of scripts.

lessons.name: Translation of Ancient Texts
lessons.description: Learn to translate ancient texts from Elvish, Dwarvish, and Rohirric into modern languages, using historical references.

lessons.name: The Role of Language in Middle-earth's Mythology
lessons.description: Understanding how language reflects the mythology, rituals, and belief systems of the inhabitants of Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Preserving Middle-earth's Ancient Scripts
lessons.description: Explore the methods of preserving ancient scripts and their importance for future generations.

name: Wizards, Elves, and Men: Advanced Diplomacy in Middle-earth
description: A deeper dive into the diplomatic intricacies between the races of Middle-earth. This course focuses on detailed case studies and the personal leadership styles of key figures.

lessons.name: The Leadership of Elrond and Galadriel
lessons.description: Study the leadership styles of Elrond and Galadriel, their influence in Middle-earth politics, and their role in maintaining alliances.

lessons.name: The Role of Gandalf in Middle-earth's Diplomacy
lessons.description: Examine Gandalf’s influence on diplomatic events, his role as a mediator and his understanding of the balance of power between races.

lessons.name: The Long Peace: The Stability of Middle-earth’s Alliances
lessons.description: Analyze the mechanisms behind the long periods of peace and stability in Middle-earth and the diplomatic strategies that ensured their longevity.

name: Diplomatic Strategies of Middle-earth
description: Study the advanced diplomatic strategies used in Middle-earth, including negotiation tactics, peace treaties, and the resolution of long-standing conflicts.

lessons.name: Negotiating with Sauron: The Failed Diplomacy
lessons.description: A detailed examination of the failed diplomatic attempts to negotiate with Sauron, including the nature of his power and how it influenced negotiations.

lessons.name: The Treaty of Rivendell
lessons.description: In-depth analysis of the Treaty of Rivendell and how it shaped the political landscape of Middle-earth for centuries.

lessons.name: The Role of the Rangers in Middle-earth’s Diplomacy
lessons.description: Explore the role of Aragorn and his Rangers in maintaining diplomatic relations and protecting the fragile alliances during times of war.
